Reviews.Title: Poor support
Reviews.Author: todd henderson
Reviews.Content: Very slow shipping. Instruction/operators manual is very weak. No detail in manual to set-up network connection. No support to talk too. Not recommended for someone without super computer knowledge.

ProductInfo.Features:
With newest third generation P2P/ Plug and play in security industry, no need to set DNNS and network port
you just need to install the client application to remote view from PC, scan QR Code to view live video from Smartphone
Email alert and SMS alert function
Motion detective
With HDMI Port and pre-install HDD 1TB
ProductInfo.Name: SANNCE HDMI 8CH H.264 P2P/QR Code Smartphone View DVR with HDD 1TB for CCTV Home Security Surveillance Cameras
